text: Sokolče is a former village which was situated in the Liptov region of Slovakia. The village was inundated by the reservoir Liptovská Mara in 1975. == Famous residents == * Stan Mikita - NHL star, member of Hockey Hall of Fame * Ján Starší (1933–2019), Slovak ice-hockey player, member of IIHF Hall of Fame * Vladimír Šmihula (*1943), Slovak journalist * Michal Vyšný (*1915- †1980, Peterborough, UK), Slovak Protestant priest and Czechoslovak officer Category:Former villages in Slovakia Category:Liptovský Mikuláš District
title: Sokolče
